thread.title: Future Has Deleted All His Instagram Posts
thread.title_full: Future Has Deleted All His Instagram Posts

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Future Has Deleted All His Instagram Posts
text:
Shortly after dropping two new songs in the past week, Future has deleted every single one of his Instagram posts . He's not the first artist to do something of this sort; last year, The Weeknd and Meek Mill have also deleted every post on their accounts before dropping new projects. The Freebandz general's latest releases, "That's A Check" and "Buy Love," arrived in the form of visuals and have yet to be available on iTunes or other services; Future's last solo project is last February's EVOL album. While no further details regarding a new release is currently available, frequent collaborator Zaytoven had announced last year that Future has finished the follow-up to their 2015 Beast Mode mixtape. Stay tuned and check his Instagram account here. 
Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
